message: I have a unique and valuable product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $11000 to make it worth my while. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9500. Can you consider that?
I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, but I'm not willing to go below $10500. That's the lowest I can go. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm glad you like the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $10000, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a premium warranty and dedicated support for an additional year. I think this is a fair price considering the value you'll get. What do you think?
